name: The Tragedy of Craig - Chapter 1
description:
The Tragedy of Craig

-Chapter 1-

Craig, a Bear, and Many Massive Eyeballs, Or, The Premature Anagnorisis, Or, Craig Takes Part In A Supremely Hackneyed Series Of Events That Are Far Beyond Him Mentally And/Or Physically

This is the first chapter of the The Tragedy of Craig. It is an experience like no other. It will keep you guessing

Features:

- Emotional story that will make you invested in the gameplay

- Fun epic gameplay that will make you invested in the story

- Gameplay variety that will keep you entertain gameplay forever

- Story twists that will keep you entertain narrative forever

Download today and see what you have been missing all of your life

(made for gbtk 8)
